headline: Bernstein Raises Caterpillar (CAT) Target as 2026 Recovery Comes Into View
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) is included among the 14 Best Dividend Aristocrats to Invest in Heading into 2026. On December 19, Bernstein raised its price target on Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE:CAT) to $630 from $557 and kept a Market Perform rating. Looking at the broader sector, the firm said 2025 has been difficult from a fundamentals standpoint. […]

headline: AI Demand Generates Rise in Caterpillar Shares
summary: Caterpillar and other generator manufacturers are benefiting from the investor optimism lifting artificial-intelligence stocks. Power-hungry AI projects have become a boon to Caterpillar, which sells engines and generators to a range of customers.

headline: CES 2026: AI, Robots, Wearables, Industrial Machines In Focus
summary: The CES 2026 technology trade show in Las Vegas promises to shine a spotlight on the physical embodiment of AI.

headline: Caterpillar becomes the Dow’s best performer this year
summary: Tami Zakaria, head of construction equity research at JPMorgan, joins ‘Money Movers’ to discuss Caterpillar as the industrial giant becomes the best-performing stock in the Dow this year.

raw.headline: Caterpillar becomes the Dow’s best performer this year
raw.summary: Tami Zakaria, head of construction equity research at JPMorgan, joins ‘Money Movers’ to discuss Caterpillar as the industrial giant becomes the best-performing stock in the Dow this year.

headline: Caterpillar’s Surging Stock Is Fueled by AI, Not Yellow Excavators
summary: An ambitious data-center project in Utah is going to need about one-quarter of the power the entire state currently uses.  David Gray, co-chief executive for the project’s developer, knows he can’t get it from the electric grid.  “Our electric grid is constrained in many areas, so we’re trying to build power generation on site,” said Gray, whose firm Joule Capital Partners plans to build six data centers for the growing artificial-intelligence server market.

headline: The Club's top 10 things to watch in the stock market Tuesday
summary: Copper is on track for its biggest one-year increase since 2009. Meanwhile, Meta announced one last acquisition of 2025.
